TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegisterAssembly extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink
Public Class RegisterAssembly Inherits AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension Implements ITypeLibExporterNotifySink
type RegisterAssembly = class inherit AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension interface ITypeLibExporterNotifySink

summary.span: 为 COM 互操作注册一个托管程序集（等效于 regasm.exe 功能，但此代码实际上不会调用 exe）。

span.span: Registers a managed assembly for COM interop (equivalent of regasm.exe functionality, but this code doesn't actually call the exe).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Framework64/ \ /RegisterAssemblyTask 无法解析注册为32位组件的 COM 对象库。Framework64/\/RegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 32-bit components. Framework/ \ /RegisterAssemblyTask 无法解析注册为64位组件的 COM 对象库。Framework/\/RegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 64-bit components. 例如，如果将名为 Classlibrary1.chainone 的 COM 对象库注册到64位计算机上的32位组件，请运行 Visual Studio，并将目标更改为 x64，生成将失败，并出现以下错误：For example, if you register a library of COM objects called ClassLibrary1 as 32-bit components on a 64-bit machine, run Visual Studio, and change the target to x64, the build fails with the following error: `ClassLibrary1.dll is not a valid assembly`

comment.span: ITypeLibExporterNotifySink 是 ITypeLibConverter ConvertAssemblyToTypeLib 调用所必需的。

span.span: ITypeLibExporterNotifySink is necessary for the ITypeLibConverter.ConvertAssemblyToTypeLib call.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定任务是否在注册表中创建 codebase 项，该项指定未在全局程序集缓存中安装的程序集的文件路径。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the task creates a codebase entry in the registry, which specifies the file path for an assembly that is not installed in the global assembly cache.

value.span: 如果任务在注册表中创建 codebase 项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the task creates a codebase entry in the registry; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果随后将安装要注册到全局程序集缓存中的程序集，则不应指定此选项。You should not specify this option if you will subsequently install the assembly that you are registering into the global assembly cache.

span.span: The assembly to find type libraries for.

summary.span: 用于查找给定程序集的类型库的回调方法。

span.span: Callback method for finding type libraries for given assemblies.

summary.span: 如果出现这种情况，则表示我们要查找的类型库不在当前目录中，也不是已注册的类型库。

span.span: If we are here, it means the type library we're looking for is not in the current directory and it's not registered.

summary.span: 目前假设已注册所有依赖类型库。

span.span: Currently we assume that all dependent type libs are already registered.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 记录一个错误，指示在所有情况下指定的程序集未注册 COM 互操作。Logs an error indicating that the specified assembly is not registered for COM interop in all cases.

comment.span: 从理论上讲，我们可以自动注册 COM 互操作的依赖程序集，并在此处返回新创建的类型。

span.span: In theory, we could automatically register dependent assemblies for COM interop and return a newly created typelib here.

comment.span: 但是，这种方法的一个危险是：用户创建了多个为 COM 互操作注册的项目，所有这些项目都引用了程序集 A。要生成的第一个项目将为 COM 互操作注册程序集 A，在其输出目录中创建类型库并注册它。

span.span: However, one danger of such approach is the following scenario: The user creates several projects registered for COM interop, all of them referencing assembly A. The first project that happens to be built will register assembly A for COM interop, creating a type library in its output directory and registering it.

comment.span: 其他项目将引用该类型库，因为它已注册。

span.span: The other projects will then refer to that type library, since it's already registered.

comment.span: 如果由于某种原因而从磁盘中删除第一个项目，则程序集 A 的类型库也会消失，而在五年前生成的所有其他项目突然停止工作。

span.span: If then for some reason the first project is deleted from disk, the typelib for assembly A goes away too, and all the other projects, built five years ago, suddenly stop working.

summary.span: 获取或设置要从指定的程序集中生成的类型库。

span.span: Gets or sets the type library to generate from the specified assembly.

value.span: 要从指定的程序集中生成的类型库。

span.span: The type library to generate from the specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的类型库包含此程序集中定义的可访问类型的定义。The generated type library contains definitions of the accessible types defined within the assembly. 仅在下列情况之一成立时才会生成此类型库：The type library is only generated if one of the following is true: - 该位置不存在同名的类型库。A type library of that name does not exist at that location. - 存在类型库，但它早于传入的程序集。A type library exists but it is older than the assembly being passed in. 如果类型库比要传递的程序集新，则不会创建新的类型库，但仍会注册程序集。If the type library is newer than the assembly being passed, a new one will not be created, but the assembly will still be registered. 如果指定此属性，它必须与属性具有相同数量的项， 否则任务将失败。If this property is specified, it must have the same number of items as the property or the task will fail. 如果未指定输入，任务会默认使用程序集的名称，并将项的扩展名更改为 .tlb。If no inputs are specified, the task will default to the name of the assembly and change the extension of the item to .tlb.
